Item.Caption: Procession to mark the return to the church of Our Lady of the Miraculous. In 1989
Holy Transfiguration Monastery in Ivano-Frankivsk. In 1989
Head of Ukrainian Autocephalous Orthodox Church, Patriarch Mstislav (Skrypnyck) in the capital of Ukraine. In 1990
